attr.title: Dark Deity II
attr.desc: Verroa is a peaceful continent on the brink of war as the Asverellian Empire seeks to expand - at your homelandâ€™s expense. Command unlikely heroes, fight challenging turn-based battles, and watch hardship forge iron into steel. Dark Deity is back, bigger and better than before!
attr.inst: Buy the game on steam. Copy all game assets to `darkdeity2/assets`.
